MajorClaims.Text: kids should never be encourage to engage in such passive activity
physical inactivity should not be encouraged for the aim of bettering youngsters' skills

Claims.Text: learning by watching TV suits some children
School has been applying traditional teaching procedure since for ages
it still performs at its best to equip a child with essential skills
teacher cannot be switched with some unconscious screens
watching television is a very passive action and should not be promoted by increasing periods spent on it
traditional education has its stand for most appropriate method

Premises.Text: classic teaching methods has been scientifically proven and utilized as the best mode of educate a child
Technology and its advance, to some degrees, have influenced the educational industry positively
it has not changed the importance of teachers' role in classes
students nowadays do their homework or researches on computers rather than go to libraries is an illustration for this
Yet, monitors are unable to replace the appearance of educators
their knowledge and adaptability is priceless

a conducted experiment indicates out-performance in skills like differentiate types of plants or animals of a child that experienced various activities in nature to a child spent most of his time watching documentaries
such activities can equip a child necessary skill that is useful for his future career
children who have had such activities that interrelate to creativity, cooperation, competition tend to perform significantly better in general terms
